info.title: Delete a tab from a tab list in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnThirdTab
setupScript.description: sets focus on the third tab
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the third tab
testPageDocument.querySelector('#complex').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Joke' tab, delete the tab.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Joke' tab, delete the tab.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: State of the tab, 'selected', is conveyed
Position of tab in the tab list, 2, is conveyed
Number of tabs in the tab list, 2, is conveyed
